doc.field: Series B: Mary Catherine L'Hommedieu Gardiner
Series B: Mary Catherine L'Hommedieu Gardiner
1823 March - 1824 March; 1827 September 12; 1828 July 24; undated, circa 1823 - 1829

Addressed To: "Mrs. Mary Catherine [L'Hommedieu] Gardiner, At Mrs. Howell's, West Hampton, Long Island," [NY] ; "No. 70 Liberty Street, New York, NY" ; "No. 172 William Street, New York," [NY] ; "Shelter Island Post Office, Sag Harbor, Suffolk County," [Long Island, NY]
Sent From: "Samuel Smith Gardiner, Albany, NY" ; "Brooklyn, NY" ; "New York, NY" ; "Sag Harbor, NY" [Husband of Mary Catherine L'Hommedieu Gardiner]

In Reference To: Family / Friendship / Marriage / Political / Social; Electoral Law in the Senate; Frances & Sarah Gardiner; Francis Granger for Lieutenant Governor; David Thompson; Davis & the garden; Gardiners Island; Judge Case; Miller Dayton; Mr. Billings & Mr. Frank; Mr. Broadhead, Preacher, Mr. Hand; Mr. Coles; Mr. [Jonathan] Dayton; Mr. Lloyd; Mr. Mulford; Mrs. Dering
Personal Correspondence: 1823 March - 1824 March; 1827 September 12; 1828 July 24; undated, circa 1823 - 1829
